devdoc.details: this oracle contract updates the reference price and LTV of ledger, therefore it should have permission to ledger.
devdoc.title: oracle contract

config(bytes32,uint256).notice: configuration It is not necessary because unit is just constant for now. (this config is for just in case)

updatePrice(bytes32).notice: update price (actually price * LTV) to ledger

userdoc.notice: get price from Feed contract and set the inverse of LTV (Loan-To-Value ratio)
